analysis.description:
XRRsale.tokenWithdraw (/unique_chucks/13/0xb8f35a92d4df97b7647aebf99da7627064371e1a.sol#143-146) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,tokenTosale()) (/unique_chucks/13/0xb8f35a92d4df97b7647aebf99da7627064371e1a.sol#145-146)

XRRsale.fallback (/unique_chucks/13/0xb8f35a92d4df97b7647aebf99da7627064371e1a.sol#148-160) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/13/0xb8f35a92d4df97b7647aebf99da7627064371e1a.sol#158-159)

XRRsale.sendTokens (/unique_chucks/13/0xb8f35a92d4df97b7647aebf99da7627064371e1a.sol#160-172) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_to,_value) (/unique_chucks/13/0xb8f35a92d4df97b7647aebf99da7627064371e1a.sol#171-172)

XRRsale.finishSale (/unique_chucks/13/0xb8f35a92d4df97b7647aebf99da7627064371e1a.sol#172-175) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(frozenVaults,tokensToFrozen) (/unique_chucks/13/0xb8f35a92d4df97b7647aebf99da7627064371e1a.sol)

Reentrancy in XRRsale.fallback (/unique_chucks/13/0xb8f35a92d4df97b7647aebf99da7627064371e1a.sol#148-160):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(tokens <= tokenTosale()) (/unique_chucks/13/0xb8f35a92d4df97b7647aebf99da7627064371e1a.sol#154-155)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalTokenRaiseWei (/unique_chucks/13/0xb8f35a92d4df97b7647aebf99da7627064371e1a.sol#157)

Reentrancy in XRRsale.sendTokens (/unique_chucks/13/0xb8f35a92d4df97b7647aebf99da7627064371e1a.sol#160-172):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(_value <= tokenTosale()) (/unique_chucks/13/0xb8f35a92d4df97b7647aebf99da7627064371e1a.sol#163-164)
	- require(bool)(tokenTosale() >= _value) (/unique_chucks/13/0xb8f35a92d4df97b7647aebf99da7627064371e1a.sol#165)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalRaiseWei (/unique_chucks/13/0xb8f35a92d4df97b7647aebf99da7627064371e1a.sol#169-170)
	- totalTokenRaiseWei (/unique_chucks/13/0xb8f35a92d4df97b7647aebf99da7627064371e1a.sol#170-171)

XRRsale.ICO1 should be constant (/unique_chucks/13/0xb8f35a92d4df97b7647aebf99da7627064371e1a.sol#107-108)
XRRsale.ICO2 should be constant (/unique_chucks/13/0xb8f35a92d4df97b7647aebf99da7627064371e1a.sol#108-110)
XRRsale.ICO3 should be constant (/unique_chucks/13/0xb8f35a92d4df97b7647aebf99da7627064371e1a.sol#110-114)
XRRsale.ICO4 should be constant (/unique_chucks/13/0xb8f35a92d4df97b7647aebf99da7627064371e1a.sol#114)
XRRsale.ICOend should be constant (/unique_chucks/13/0xb8f35a92d4df97b7647aebf99da7627064371e1a.sol#114-115)
XRRsale.PreSaleEnd should be constant (/unique_chucks/13/0xb8f35a92d4df97b7647aebf99da7627064371e1a.sol#104-105)
XRRsale.PreSaleStart should be constant (/unique_chucks/13/0xb8f35a92d4df97b7647aebf99da7627064371e1a.sol#103)
XRRsale.frozenVaults should be constant (/unique_chucks/13/0xb8f35a92d4df97b7647aebf99da7627064371e1a.sol#94-97)
XRRsale.wallet should be constant (/unique_chucks/13/0xb8f35a92d4df97b7647aebf99da7627064371e1a.sol#91-92)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/13/0xb8f35a92d4df97b7647aebf99da7627064371e1a.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/13/0xb8f35a92d4df97b7647aebf99da7627064371e1a.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_amount' of XRRsale.checkAmount (/unique_chucks/13/0xb8f35a92d4df97b7647aebf99da7627064371e1a.sol#125-126) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_to' of XRRsale.sendTokens (/unique_chucks/13/0xb8f35a92d4df97b7647aebf99da7627064371e1a.sol#161) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of XRRsale.sendTokens (/unique_chucks/13/0xb8f35a92d4df97b7647aebf99da7627064371e1a.sol#161) is not in mixedCase
